result.advice: Based on your analysis, your 3-month-old banana plant, Banana Plant , is in the seedling stage and has a leaf disease called Banana Cordana. Here s some care advice: Address the Banana Cordana: Research treatments for Banana Cordana. You may need to use a fungicide. Follow the instructions on the fungicide carefully.

questions.question: How much water i should give now as it will be raining in somewhile
questions.answer: I do not have the ability to determine how much water you should give your banana plants, as I do not have access to real-time weather data. However, I can tell you that banana plants need 35-40mm of water per week. You should also consider that the ideal rainfall for banana plants is 125-150mm per month.
